name: 陳俊豪
objective:
本課程將介紹計算智慧的相關知識、技術與其優點，旨在教授學生如何運用計算智慧技術解決實際問題。課程目標有二：(1)相關的計算智慧技術與其運作原理，包含：遺傳演算法、多目標遺傳演算法等；(2)相關的應用案例討論。透過此課程，學生將可套用計算智慧技術於各種最佳化問題。
This course will introduce related knowledge, techniques and merits of computational intelligence for providing useful ways for students to solve the real application problems. The goals of this course include two parts: (1) related computational intelligence techniques and how it work, including genetic algorithms, multi-objective genetic algorithm, etc; (2) related applications and discussions. Through this course, students can learn how to apply computational intelligence on different optimization problems.
schedule:
Week 1:　　Computational Intelligence Overview
Week 2:　　GAs: What are they? (Simple Genetic Algorithms)
Week 3:　　GAs: Why do they work? (Schema Theorem)
Week 4:　　Binary or Float? (Real Code Genetic Algorithms)
Week 5:　　Grouping Problem and Grouping Genetic Algorithm
Week 6:　　Multi-objective Problems and Solutions (Multi-objective Genetic Algorithms)
Week 7:　　Advanced Optimization techniques - SPEA, SPEAII
Week 8:　　Advanced Optimization techniques - MOEA/D
Week 9:　　Midterm Examination
Week 10:　　Applications on Business Intelligence
Week 11:　　Applications on Portfolio Management
Week 12:　　Applications on Pattern Discovery
Week 13:　　Case Discussion & Paper Study
Week 14:　　Case Discussion & Paper Study
Week 15:　　Case Discussion & Paper Study
Week 16:　　Case Discussion & Paper Study
Week 17:　　Final Project Presentation
Week 18:　　Final Examination
